content.text:
# 2004 Texas Democratic presidential primary

| image1 =
| candidate1 = John Kerry
| color1 = 00539f
| home_state1 = Massachusetts
| delegate_count1 = 186
| popular_vote1 = 563,237
| percentage1 = 67.11%
| candidate2 = John Edwards(withdrawn)
| image2 =
| color2 = e50100
| home_state2 = North Carolina
| delegate_count2 = 9
| popular_vote2 = 120,413
| percentage2 = 14.35%
| map_image = 2004 Texas Democratic presidential primary election results map by county (vote share).svg
| map_size = 280px
| map_caption = County resultsKerry:          Edwards: No results:
}}
A presidential primary for the Democratic Party was held in Texas in 2004 as part of the selection process for the Democratic candidate for the presidential elections that year.
